offer_settings.coupon_offer: Get a 15% discount on menu items

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms:
<p>The menu of the restaurant Matryoshka consists entirely of Russian dishes prepared from products from all over Russia. Even customary &#8220;Olivier&#8221; salad is performed audaciously here &#8211; it includes crayfish, game meat, pressed caviar. also you can try here a variety of soups, fish, meat and lenten dishes, as well as snacks and sweets.</p>
<p>The interior of the restaurant Matryoshka reminds us of the end of the XIX century: a cast-iron staircase and accessories, copper pipes, and the bar is a real pharmacy that is more than a hundred years old.</p>
